languages.text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.
languages.original_text: Каждый отдельный случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дает хелбруту +1 уровень эффекта "безграничная злоба". Каждый уровень увеличивает наносимый хелбрутом урон на 1% и сокращает его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 0,5%. Каждые 10 уровней эффекта увеличивают число атак хелбрута в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на 1 и уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of damage, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its armour by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per turn by +1 and decreases his deflection by −1.

Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

languages.text: Cada vez que el Bruto Infernal sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}, gana 1 acumulación de Maldad ilimitada. Cada acumulación aumenta el daño del Bruto Infernal en un +1 % y reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −0,5 %. Además, por cada 10 acumulaciones se aumenta el número de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Bruto Infernal en +1 y se reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en −1.
languages.original_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el Bruto Infernal sufre daños, gana 1 acumulación de Maldad ilimitada. Cada acumulación aumenta el daño del Bruto Infernal en un +1 % y reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} en un −0,5 %. Además, por cada 10 acumulaciones se aumenta el número de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Bruto Infernal en +1 y se reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en −1.

languages.text: 每当地狱兽受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得1层“无尽恶意”效果。每层“无尽恶意”会使地狱兽造成的伤害提高1%，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低0.5%。此外，每10层“无尽恶意”效果会让地狱兽每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数增加1此，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: 每当地狱兽受到伤害时，都会获得1层“无尽恶意”效果。每层“无尽恶意”会使地狱兽造成的伤害提高1%，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}降低0.5%。此外，每10层“无尽恶意”效果会让地狱兽每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数增加1此，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le Métabrutus subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, il acquiert +1 cumul de Malice sans limites. Chaque cumul augmente les dégâts du Métabrutus de 1 % et réduit son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de 0,5 %. En outre, tous les 10 cumuls, le nombre d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Métabrutus augmente de 1 tandis que sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} baisse de 1.
languages.original_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Métabrutus subit des dégâts, il acquiert +1 cumul de Démon Sans Limites. Chaque cumul augmente les dégâts du Métabrutus de +1 % et fait baisser sa valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de -0,5 %. En outre, tous les 10 cumuls, le nombre d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Métabrutus augmente de +1 tandis que sa valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} baisse de -1.

languages.text: Wenn der Höllenschlächter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, erhält +1 Stapel "Grenzenlose Bosheit". Jeder Stapel erhöht den Schaden des Höllenschlächters um +1 % und reduziert seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −0,5 %. Ferner erhöhen jeweils 10 Stapel die Zahl der Angriffe des Höllenschlächters pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} um +1 und reduzieren seine {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} um −1.
languages.original_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Höllenschlächter Schaden nimmt, wird ihm +1 von Grenzenlose Bosheit aufaddiert. Jede Addition erhöht den Schaden des Höllenschlächters um +1% und reduziert seine {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Runde{/g} um −0.5 %. Zusätzlich erhöhen alle 10 Additionen die Anzahl der Angriffe des Höllenschlächters pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} um +1 und reduzieren seine {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} um −1.

languages.text: ヘルブルートが{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を実際に受けるたびに、無限のマリスを累積で +1獲得する。累積するたびにヘルブルートのダメージは +1%上昇し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は −0.5%減少する。さらに、10回累積するたびにヘルブルートの1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}あたりの攻撃回数が +1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は −1減少する。
languages.original_text: Each time the Helbrute suffers an instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he gains +1 stack of boundless malice. Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: ヘルブルートがダメージを実際に受けるたびに、無限のマリスを累積で +1獲得する。累積するたびにヘルブルートのダメージは +1%上昇し、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}は −0.5%減少する。さらに、10回累積するたびにヘルブルートの1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}あたりの攻撃回数が +1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}は −1減少する。

languages.text: Каждый отдельный случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дает хелбруту +1 уровень эффекта "безграничная злоба". Каждый уровень увеличивает наносимый хелбрутом урон на 1% и сокращает его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 0,5%. Каждые 10 уровней эффекта увеличивают число атак хелбрута в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на 1 и уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1.

Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text: Каждый отдельный случай получения урона дает хелбруту +1 уровень эффекта "безграничная злоба". Каждый уровень увеличивает наносимый хелбрутом урон на 1% и сокращает его {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 0,5%. Каждые 10 уровней эффекта увеличивают число атак хелбрута в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на 1 и уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1.

Каждый отдельный случай получения урона дает хелбруту +1 уровень эффекта "безграничная злоба". Каждый уровень увеличивает наносимый хелбрутом урон на 1% и сокращает его {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 0,5%. Каждые 10 уровней эффекта увеличивают число атак хелбрута в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на 1 и уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1.

languages.text: Tamu Kaçkını, her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesine maruz kaldığında +1 Sınırsız Şer birikimi kazanır. Her birikim, Tamu Kaçkını'nın vereceği hasarı %1 artırırken {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerini ise %0,5 azaltır. Ayrıca her 10 birikim, Tamu Kaçkını'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başına saldırı sayısını 1 puan artırırken {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerini ise 1 puan azaltır.

Each stack increases the Helbrute's damage by +1% and decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −0.5%. Additionally, every 10 stacks increase the number of the Helbrute's attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +1 and decreases his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1.
